snippet: The Supreme Court decision to deny review of five same-sex marriage cases is in line with an American public that supports same-sex marriage but says its legality should be left to each individual state to decide.
abstract: The Supreme Court decision to deny review of five same-sex marriage cases is in line with an American public that supports same-sex marriage but says its legality should be left to each individual state to decide.

headline.main: Court's Gay Marriage Decision Is in Line With Public Opinion

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
